title: SubView
description: A non-routable UI fragment embedded within a parent View. Two usage modes: (1) Library instance — 'ref' is populated with a ux.librarysubview specNodeId, rendering that reusable fragment; (2) Inline definition — 'ref' is absent and the SubView defines its own composition inline. SubViews are not independently routable; use View for routable pages.

order.description: Render order of this SubView within its parent View's subViews list. Lower values render first (top-to-bottom or left-to-right depending on layout).

ref.description: SpecNodeId of the ux.librarysubview this instance is based on (e.g., 'ux.librarysubview.data-table-with-filters'). When present, this SubView is a library instance; when absent, it is an inline definition.
